title: For candidates
description:
When you reach a senior level in your career the right opportunities are fewer and further between. They are often unadvertised, and with headhunters or hiring managers who you dont know (and who don't know you).

We collect pertinent information from you that is not in your linkedin profile. This rich information will inform these senior hiring professionals so that you don't have to call everyone in the yellow pages.

title: For headhunters
description: LinkedIn has become a critical tool for informaiton gathering. This data, combined with your proporietary infomration and other providers such as boardex come together to facilitate your target lists. And yet there is still a big information gap. Your highly trained researchers spend a huge amount of time collectojnga richer contextual infroamtion that isn't available anywhere else and is out of date as soon as it is collected. We collect that information, and keep it up to date, so that they can direct thir efforts where their skills really count

title: For hiring managers
description: Extensive research has demonstrated just how critical senior hiring is. The war for talent continues, and it is a dog fight. But it doesn't need to be. Understanding top talent on a personal level is the jkey. Finding the right someone for the right challeng at just the right itme is what gives the best hiring exercises the edge. This requires much richer - and up to date - informaiton than is availble in LinkedIn. We extract this information first-hand from the individual, at source.
